item.title: Biden rejected appeals of several top advisers in blocking U.S. Steel bid
item.description: Senior administration officials had reservations about calling Nippon Steel’s takeover proposal a “national security risk.”

item.title: Jimmy Carter’s final trip begins with procession through rural Georgia
item.description: The motorcade bearing the former president’s casket passed through his beloved hometown of Plains before arriving in Atlanta.

item.title: Johnson attributes prayer to Thomas Jefferson, but there’s no proof he said it
item.description: According to the Thomas Jefferson Foundation, there’s no evidence that the third president of the United States ever recited a prayer for the nation, ...

item.title: Dramatic speaker vote may be the start, not the end, of House GOP chaos
item.description: Mike Johnson won what should be a full term in one ballot, but his Republican antagonists are lying in wait for another ambush.

item.title: Trump sentencing sets up an unusual scene ahead of his inauguration
